briefTitle: Efficacy of Fibrin Sealant to Reduce the Amount of Post-thyroidectomy Drain

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* proven thyroid carcinoma
* Thyroidectomy with anterior compartment neck dissection

Exclusion Criteria:

* No use of harmonic scalpel during surgery
* coagulation abnormality
* refuse to participate

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Drainage Amount
outcomeMeasures.description: method : measurement of drainage fluids from negative suction system every 8 hr until daily total amount reduces under 20mL
